attributes.action: allow childcare providers to become zero rated on VAT.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment childcare providers are exempt from VAT registration. This means that we have to pay the VAT on already exorbiante costs from educational suppliers. By being Zero Rated would allow us to claim the VAT back without having to charge users of childcare the VAT and reinvest this back into Childcare,
